name: Habitica Ultra-Compact
description: Most space is devoted to tasks. Other stuff is darker so tasks stand out.
additional_info:
I have only used this style in Chrome. I don't know whether it works in Firefox. 

This is my first shared style and my second CSS project ever, so feedback is welcome but please be kind. 

Changelog (starts 7/12/16, past changes are not available):
7/12/16: better compatibility with other styles
7/17/16: add pixel waves background and make it the new default (for Summer Splash event)
8/1/16: compact inventory, transparent inventory backgrounds, change default back (end of Summer Splash)
8/6/16: improve pet food display, transparent background for Time Travelers pets/mounts
9/22/16: change default background to Halloween option
11/2/16: remove party invite button, toolbar smaller & higher, level text more subtle, change default background to a Fall option, re-enable checkbox count buttons, fix +/- color, move party left, move avatar down, show Bailey's torso
11/4/16: revert change party location b/c apparently it breaks stats bars on Firefox
11/23/16: change shading to black, adjust stats colors, more background options
11/28/16: make more things darker, change default background to nighttime option for winter solstice
12/18/16: default to a winter background that I like better
12/30/16: show Bailey's full character
02/3/17: default to a Valentine background, make a menu darker
2/15/17: shrink inventory header, default to a non-Valentine background
3/21/17: remove broken background link, default to spring grass background
6/21/17: same but for Summer Splash background
10/2/17: overhaul for site redesign
